title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not properly save filter information when closing and reopening the dialog.
OB: When I open the XML Edit Data Set dialog, set a filter expression, close the dialog, and then reopen it, the filter expression is no longer displayed in the dialog. The filter information does not persist.
EB: The filter expression entered in the XML Edit Data Set dialog should be saved and displayed when closing and reopening the dialog. This will allow users to easily see and modify the filter expression without having to re-enter it each time.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter a filter expression in the appropriate field.
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog.

Expected result:
The filter expression previously entered should still be displayed in the dialog.

Actual result:
The filter expression is not displayed in the dialog and needs to be re-entered.
